content: तलः --लं [तल्-अच्] {@--1@} A surface; भुवस्तलमिव व्योम कुर्वन् व्योमेव भूतलं <ls>R. 4. 29</ls>; sometimes used at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> without much alteration of meaning; महीतलं ‘surface of the earth’ {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} earth itself; शुद्धे तू दर्पणतले मुलभावकाशा <ls>Ś. 7. 32</ls>; नभस्तलं &c. {@--2@} The palm of the hand; <ls>R. 6. 18.</ls> {@--3@} The sole of the foot. {@--4@} The fore-arm. {@--5@} A slap with the hand. {@--6@} Lowness, inferiority of position. {@--7@} A lower part, part underneath, base, foot, bottom; रेवारोधसि वेतसीतरुतले चेतः समुत्कंठते <ls>K. P. 1.</ls> {@--8@} (Hence) The ground under a tree or any other object, shelter afforded by anything; फणी मयूरस्य तले निषीदति <ls>Rs. 1. 13.</ls> {@--9@} A hole, pit. {@--10@} A span. --लः {@--1@} The hilt of a sword. {@--2@} The palmyra tree. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--4@} Pressing the strings of a lute with the left hand. {@--5@} A division of hell. --लं {@--1@} A pond. {@--2@} A forest, wood. {@--3@} Cause, origin, motive. {@--4@} A leathern fence worn round the left arm (तला also in this sense).
